entry.title: New release for Plant-It: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Hello, Plant-it community!

Services version

  • server version: 0.6.0
  • app version: 0.7.0

Highlights

This release includes the German translation and prepares the app for upload to the F-Droid store.

What's Changed

ğŸ“± App

  • Add German translation (thanks to @CodingEmil)
  • Change hint text in setting server window (thanks to @CodingEmil)
  • Fix Android apk app connection issue

ğŸ—„ï¸ Server

no change

ğŸ““ Documentation

no change

New Contributors

  • @CodingEmil made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/164

Full Changelog

https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/compare/0.6.0...0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Plant-It: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Hello, Plant-it community!

Services version

  • server version: 0.6.1
  • app version: 0.7.1

Highlights

This release includes small fixes, small improvements and new Portuguese language.

What's Changed

ğŸ“± App

  • Fix translation issue with reminder action dropdown
  • Add Portuguese language (thanks to @WPitombeira).
  • Improve German translation (thanks to @CodingEmil)
  • Improve Italian translation

ğŸ—„ï¸ Server

  • Fix String Endpoint JSON Responses

ğŸ““ Documentation

  • Add API Key retrieval section
  • Add "App installation" section
  • Better structure of the "Server installation" section

New Contributors

  • @WPitombeira made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/169

Full Changelog

https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/compare/0.7.0...0.7.1

entry.title: New release for Plant-It: v0.7.2
entry.content:
Hello, Plant-it community!

Services version

  • server version: 0.6.2
  • app version: 0.7.2

Highlights

This release adds support for French and Danish languages. Additionally, dependencies are upgraded across the application to ensure better performance and security.

What's Changed

ğŸ“± App

  • Added French language (thanks to @quentains)
  • Added Danish language (thanks to @LovelessCodes)
  • Upgraded dependencies

ğŸ—„ï¸ Server

  • Upgraded dependencies

ğŸ““ Documentation

  • Added documentation about Kubernetes and Helm deployment

New Contributors

  • @quentains made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/195
  • @LovelessCodes made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/210
  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/187

Full Changelog

https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/compare/0.7.1...0.7.2

entry.title: New release for Plant-It: v0.7.3
entry.content:
Hello, Plant-it community!

Highlights

This release includes a temporary fix to resolve the SSL certificate expiration issue affecting the Trefle service. This fix ensures uninterrupted functionality until we transition to another dataset source. Additionally, we've introduced a new language change functionality in this release. For more details on the transition, please refer to this issue.

Services version

  • server version: 0.6.3
  • app version: 0.7.3

What's Changed

ğŸ“± App

  • Add Language Change Functionality
  • Update German translation (thanks to @Mega-Cookie)

ğŸ—„ï¸ Server

  • Fix Trefle SSL certificate expiration

ğŸ““ Documentation

  • Add a warning about future Trefle service transition

New Contributors

  • @Mega-Cookie made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/217

Full Changelog

https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/compare/0.7.2...0.7.3

entry.title: New release for Plant-It: v0.7.4
entry.content:
[!NOTE] This release changes the backend dataset from Trefle to FloraCodex. Please read this release note in order to use the new service version.

Hello, Plant-it community!

Services version

  • server version: 0.7.0
  • app version: 0.7.4

Highlights

This version aims to temporarily fix the shut down of the Trefle service. The backend dataset is now set to FloraCodex until a new solution is achieved (follow this and this GitHub discussion for more info on this topic).

What's Changed

ğŸ“± App

  • Add Dutch language

ğŸ—„ï¸ Server

  • Change backend dataset from Trefle to FloraCodex
  • Backend dataset URL is now configurable

ğŸ““ Documentation

  • Updated documentation with the new FloraCodex service properties

New Contributors

  • @fsmeets84 made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/224
  • @astappiev made their first contribution in https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/pull/231

Full Changelog

https://github.com/MDeLuise/plant-it/compare/0.7.3...0.7.4
